title: Zilean's Bombings
body: i have been thinking of a custom Gamemode called Zilean's bombings. the rules are simple, 1 zilean on the enemy team while the other 5 players on the allied team, you're job is to kill team mates with the bombs zilean places on you, however u are not allowed to kill the zilean, ever. you will have 6 lives and if u die by a bomb zilean placed on you it's only half a life reducted. banned champions will be nocturne,sivir,shen,kassadin,poppy,anivia,fizz and kalista. banned items include banshees veil, zhonyas, spectres cowl and merc treads, though zilean can buy anything he wants except for twin shadows. players will be restrained to the map howling abyss to negate recalling, and u are not allowed to pick up the healing stations until 10 min unless you're zilean. champions with dashing abilties are gladly accepted in this gamemode. and to clear any confusion this is for custom games only not an idea for a riot made event. thank you for taking the time to read this discussion, good luck summoners and have a good day{{champion:26}}  {{champion:115}}
